mapper.sql: id, record_date, package_url, fix_content, image_id, developer, commit_id, tester, test_result, remarks, android_version, category, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from customer_package_record
AND android_version = #{androidVersion}
AND category = #{category}
AND fix_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fixContent}, '%')
AND developer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{developer}, '%')
AND tester LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tester}, '%')
AND test_result = #{testResult}
AND image_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{imageId}, '%')
AND commit_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{commitId}, '%')
AND remarks LIKE CONCAT('%', #{remarks}, '%')
order by record_date desc, id desc
mapper.delete:
delete from customer_package_record where id in
#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_package_record(record_date, package_url, fix_content, image_id, developer, commit_id, tester, test_result, remarks, android_version, category) values (#{recordDate}, #{packageUrl}, #{fixContent}, #{imageId}, #{developer}, #{commitId}, #{tester}, #{testResult}, #{remarks}, #{androidVersion}, #{category})
